params.description: params defines the client parameters to update. NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

MsgUpdateParams.title: Msg Update Params
MsgUpdateParams.description: MsgUpdateParams defines the sdk.Msg type to update the client parameters.

allowed_clients.description: allowed_clients defines the list of allowed client state types which can be created and interacted with. If a client type is removed from the allowed clients list, usage of this client will be disabled until it is added again to the list.

ibc.core.client.v1.Params.title: Params
ibc.core.client.v1.Params.description: Params defines the set of IBC light client parameters.
